item.title: Embert Agrees With Texas - Voter Fraud = Felony With Prison - Season 2 - Episode 10
item.description: A published article (https://www.theepochtimes.com/legislation-in-texas-could-make-voter-fraud-a-felony_4865527.html) says Texas wants to make voter fraud a felony which comes with a sentence of up to 20 years in prison. Embert supports this and wants to take it one step further and have it classified as what it realistically is... treason... which has one and only one penalty... Embert is recruiting support for his version of the Bill.

item.title: Embert Goes OFF - Season 2 - Episode 9
item.description: Short, tough, and to the point. Embert’s shortest podcast of all time. Embert is downright pissed at the election results and feels Americans did not do their part OR that it’s all fraud. He’s right about one or the other. It seems the latter is likely. Hang on to your britches because we haven’t heard him this upset ever.

item.title: Embert Lays Out What To Expect From The NEW Twitter - Season 2 - Episode 6
item.description: Embert welcomes Mr. Monks (Musk) officially to Twitter as its new owner and lays out what he expects to see happen on the new Twitter. Also, he'll issue a stern warning to Facebook, Meta, Snapchat, and Tik Tok while praising Parler, Truth Social, and of course Twitter... now... that it is under control of a free speech believer. Embert predicts the future of the other platforms if they do not follow suit with the new Twitter.

item.title: Embert Chimes in About Twitter's New Owner - Season 1 - Episode 14
item.description: Today, Embert gives his thoughts on Elon Musk (or Monks as he calls him despite all the practice runs) taking over ownership of Twitter. He also records this entire episode with his microphone on the floor (which amazingly still recorded well), realizes it at the end, and cuts out his own audio while talking about it. It also sounds like he breaks wind toward the end as he leans forward, but it has been verified this was the chair, not wind breaking... although he does burp at one point in the show... again... and explains how jelly beans are the culprit. Oh, Embert!

item.title: Embert Shares A Feel-Good Story About Brandon Puckett - Season 1 - Episode 13
item.description: Brandon Puckett lost his wallet in Fort Wayne, IN while attending a baseball game. It turns out it was wedged between the seats and was found eight months later by an employee. Embert is overjoyed to see that there is some good left in this world, jaded by the events of the past several years. This is a case of "Let's Go Brandon" meant for an actual Brandon in a good way.

item.title: Embert Celebrates The Mouse Tax - Walt Disney World Has To Pay Taxes Now - Season 1 - Episode 12
item.description: Governor Ron DeSantis of Florida's Senate approved removing Walt Disney's special privileges which will now force them to pay billions in taxes if it doesn't fall through or get reversed on a commitment from Disney. Embert is all excited. He knows he can't move to Florida because Weird AF News cautions against it with their Florida Fridays, but he knows this will be a financial boost for the citizens of Florida. What to do? What to do?

item.title: Embert Answers Questions from Fans #2 - Season 1 - Episode 9
item.description:
Today, Embert answers questions from three fans (below) for his Easter show.  Send Embert an email to embert@itsembert.com with your questions, comments, or topics you'd like him to cover! Happy Easter!!

Questions:

Hey embert I hope you have a fun easter. So my mom said for easter we are getting chicken from the grocery store deli and potato wedges. I told her it is easter and we have to have ham and I expect her to make a ham or I am not eating anything. She said I am out of control. What do you think? Tammy

Embert, will your grandson be on any shows with you? Thx, David

Dear Mr. Embert,

What did you do for work before you retired? How many jobs did you have? My generation tends to have a lot of jobs for only a year or two at a time. I don’t understand why.

Love your show!

Dianna

item.title: Embert Squashes Inflation - Season 1 - Episode 8
item.description: In this episode, Embert gives a real solution to inflation, so easy that you'll kick yourself for not coming to terms with it yourself long, long ago. Whether it's a new car, gasoline, groceries... anything... Embert will give you "the secret" to completely squashing inflation. It takes a village... so be sure to share this insightful information with everyone you know, and ask them to do the same!

item.title: Embert Teaches us How to Spot "The Gay" - A Bullying Discovery - Season 1 - Episode 7
item.description:
Embert becomes enraged when he sees a video on Twitter of a gay student at school being bullied. He tells us about "back in his day" how the kids decided someone was gay. But he has uncovered the secret to spot someone that is probably gay or curious without saying a word. It's pretty scientific!

If you're listening to the podcast rather than the video, visit https://twitter.com/ItsEmbert/status/1515076813961277442 to see the post on Twitter that Embert is referring to.

NOTE: This is not a video about HOW TO bully people nor does Embert encourage it AT ALL!

item.title: Embert Answers Viewer/Listener Questions #1 - Season 1 - Episode 2
item.description:
Embert answers viewer/listener questions in this episode:

Dear Embert,

Do you have any tattoos? If so, what are they of? If not, do you want one? If not, what if you were forced to get one. What would you get it of?

Hi Embert!

I like your show so far. I hope it is a big hit! Have you ever eaten someone’s lunch at work or has someone ever eaten yours? I have a coworker that does that all the time. Can I do something like give her a laxative?  Kelly

Embert, there’s this girl I wanna ask out. I’m only 22 so I am shy. What’s a good pickup line? I was thinking of saying hey baby let’s roll. What do you think? Danny

item.title: Embert Tells It Like It Is About Will Smith & Chris Rock's Slap Heard Around the World!
item.description: This is Embert's official debut video. OMG, we have to do something about the lighting. His face looks ghost white. He only had his upper dentures in so he sounds like it. He's wearing sunglasses because he's mad about the bright light on to help the video (well, maybe not so much help it appears), and he complains because he doesn't have his blue sweater which he loves to wear constantly!  OMG his lips!! He looks like a total ghost. Anyhow, he's covering the whole Will Smith/Chris Rock scandal in this first official video!
